name: Wolverhamptonwandererstalk
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: wolverhampton wanderers talk
Developer Terms of Use
des:
We share live updates and opinions about football club Wolverhampton FC. We cover game result, fan opinions, recent issue and news about the club

[How to use]
You can say, “Alexa, open Wolverhampton wanderers talk” to hear the latest stories. While listening to a story, you can say ”Alexa, stop” to stop the story. You can continue to the next story by answering “Yes” to the question “Would you like to read the next post?"

Example phrase:
"Alexa, open Wolverhampton wanderers talk"

[Dialogue flow]
a. The Skill will play its welcome message upon hearing the user’s command, “Alexa, open Wolverhampton wanderers talk."
b. The Skill will automatically play the most recent posting from the open Wolverhampton wanderers talkguru board from wecast.ai.
c.After playing the most recent post, the Skill will ask “Would you like to read the next post?”
- If the listener says “Yes”, the Skill will play the next posting
- If the listener says “No”, the Skill will exit the Skill
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
